verses.roman:
āmā haite guṇī baḍa jagate asambhava
ekali rādhāte tāhā kari anubhava

synonyms: āmā haite—than Me; guṇī—qualified; baḍa—greater; jagate—in the world; asambhava—there is no possibility; ekali—only; rādhāte—in Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī; tāhā—that; kari anubhava—I can understand.
translation: "One more qualified than Me is impossible to find in the world. But in Rādhā alone I feel the presence of one who can give Me pleasure.
